title: Stunning 2 Story Downtown Condo Style Apt! Luxury Modern Design!
neighborhood: Lodo * Union Station * Downtown Denver * Ballpark * 5 Point
posting_body: Residence 510 is a contemporary 1,272 sqft one bedroom, one den, and one-and-a-half bath unit with elegant Ash hardwood floors.
A unique feature in the building, the floors in this unit are stained a rich ebony for added drama.
From your 318-square-foot private terrace you can enjoy the natural gas hookups that allow for easy outdoor entertaining using a full-sized barbecue grill.
The lower level includes living and dining areas as well as a powder room and an expansive in-unit storage closet under the staircase.
The primary suite on the upper level includes a spacious closet and ensuite bathroom with a double sink vanity, enticing soaking tub, and wall-to-wall Carrera marble.
The den space off the bedroom, separated by pocket doors will lend itself well to a home office or media room.
